feed.title: The Collagen Co. - the collagen life

entry.title: Brown Rice Pudding
entry.content:
Creamy, comforting, and packed with protein — this Brown Rice Pudding is a nourishing twist on a classic dessert. Made with our Mixed Berry Collagen for a fruity boost, it’s naturally sweetened with honey and perfectly spiced with cinnamon. Serve it warm with fresh orange segments for a cozy, feel-good treat!

Ingredients (serves 3)

  • ½ cup brown rice
  • 2 scoops Mixed Berry Premium Collage Peptides
  • ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1 tablespoon honey
  • 2 ¼ cups milk of choice
  • ½ an orange, segmented, to serve

Method

  1. In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, combine the brown rice, Berry Collagen, cinnamon, honey, and 2 cups of milk. Bring to a boil.

  2. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.

  3. Add the remaining ¼ cup of milk and continue to simmer for a further 15 minutes, or until the rice is soft and creamy.

  4. Serve warm, topped with orange segments, an extra sprinkle of cinnamon, and an optional splash of milk. Enjoy!

Nutrition information (per serve)

Calories: 254
Fat: 3.5g
Carbohydrates: 43.3g
Protein: 13.3g

entry.title: Carrot Cake Loaf
entry.content:
Moist, fluffy and packed with protein — this Carrot Cake Loaf is a wholesome twist on a classic favourite! Made with The Collagen Co. Vanilla Glow Shakes, it’s loaded with warming spices, crunchy walnuts, and topped with a creamy vanilla protein frosting for the ultimate feel-good treat.

Ingredients (serves 8)

  • 1 ½ cups (150g) grated carrot 
  • 1 mashed banana
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 cup (100g) almond flour
  • 1 cup (100g) Vanilla Milkshake Glow Shake
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • ½ teaspoon mixed spice
  • 2 teaspoons baking powder
  • ½ cup chopped walnuts and raisins

For the frosting

  • 125g light spreadable cream cheese
  • 1 tablespoon Vanilla Milkshake Glow Shake
  • 1 tablespoon water

Method 

  1. Preheat the oven to 160°C and line a loaf tin with baking paper.
  2. In a large mixing bowl, combine all of the loaf ingredients and mix until well combined.
  3. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf tin and bake for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
  4. Allow the loaf to cool completely.
  5. In a small bowl, mix together the frosting ingredients until smooth and well combined.
  6. Spread the frosting evenly over the cooled loaf, using the back of a spoon to create little swirls or flecks.
  7. Slice and enjoy!

Nutrition information (per serve)

Calories: 241
Fat: 14.9g
Carbs: 16.4g
Protein: 14.1g

entry.title: Choc Chip Protein Hot Cross Buns
entry.content:
Soft, fluffy and protein-packed — these Choc Chip Protein Hot Cross Buns are a healthier twist on the Easter classic! Made with The Collagen Co. Chocolate Glow Shakes for an extra boost of protein and rich chocolate flavour, they’re the perfect guilt-free treat to enjoy all season long.

Ingredients (makes 8 buns)

  • 2 ¼ cups (280g) plain flour 
  • 50g Chocolate Milkshake Glow Shake 
  • ½ cup (100g) sugar
  • 7g yeast 1.5 tsp cinnamon
  • ¼ tsp nutmeg
  • ¼ tsp allspice
  • ¼ tsp salt
  • 80ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 100g high-protein yogurt
  • 1 egg yolk
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 40g choc chips

For the Cross

  • 20g plain flour
  • 10g sugar
  • 20ml water

For the Glaze

  • Sugar-free maple syrup

Method

  1. Mix Dry Ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, protein powder, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, salt, and yeast.
  2. Warm Milk: Heat the almond milk in the microwave for about 30 seconds or until lukewarm. Pour the warm milk into the dry ingredients. If the dough feels too dry, gradually add extra milk, one tablespoon at a time.
  3. Combine Wet Ingredients: In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg yolk, yogurt, and vanilla extract. Add this mixture to the dry ingredients and stir until a slightly sticky dough forms.
  4. Rest Dough (Optional): Cover the bowl and let the dough rest for 10 minutes to allow the ingredients to fully hydrate.
  5. Knead Dough: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface and knead for 10-15 minutes by hand, or use a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook. Gradually knead in the chocolate chips until evenly distributed.
  6. First Rise: Place the dough into a lightly greased bowl, cover, and leave it to rise in a warm place for 1-3 hours, or until doubled in size. Note: The addition of protein powder may slow the rising process.
  7. Shape Buns: Once risen, gently punch down the dough to release air. Roll the dough into a log and divide it into 8 equal portions. Shape each piece into a smooth ball and arrange them on a greased or lined baking tray.
  8. Second Rise: Cover the buns with a clean towel or plastic wrap and let them rise for another 1-1.5 hours, or until puffy.
  9. Make Crosses: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Mix the flour and water to form a thick paste. Transfer the paste to a piping bag or zip-lock bag with the corner snipped off, and pipe a cross over each bun.
  10. Bake: Bake the buns for 22-25 minutes, or until golden brown.
  11. Glaze & Cool: While the buns are still warm, brush them with sugar-free maple syrup. Transfer to a wire rack and allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before serving.

Nutrition Information (Per Serving)

Calories: 248
Protein: 11g
Carbohydrates: 39g
Fat: 6g
Fibre: 3g

*Nutrition information includes the Chocolate Milkshake Glow Shake

entry.title: Zucchini Omelette
entry.content:
A light, protein-packed omelette filled with sautéed zucchini and melted cheddar cheese—perfect for a nourishing start to your day. Paired with our refreshing Tropical Punch Beauty Greens for an extra boost of nutrients and glow from within.

Ingredients

  • 1 zucchini, thinly slice
  • 1/4 brown onion, thinly sliced
  • Salt & pepper, to taste
  • 2 eggs
  • 25g cheddar cheese, grated
  • 1 serving Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens
  • 1 glass water

Method

  1. Heat a medium pan over medium heat and lightly spray with olive oil.
  2. Sauté the zucchini and onion for 3–4 minutes until soft. Remove from the pan and set aside.
  3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper.
  4. Spray the pan with oil again, then pour in the egg mixture, tilting to evenly cover the base. Cook for 2 minutes.
  5. Add the sautéed zucchini and onion to one side of the omelette, sprinkle with cheddar cheese, and fold the omelette over.
  6. Cook for another minute until the cheese melts and the omelette is fully set. Transfer to a plate.
  7. Mix the Tropical Punch Beauty Greens into a glass of water until fully dissolved, and serve alongside the omelette.

Macros

Calories: 346 kcal
Protein: 33.5g
Fat: 18.4g
Carbohydrates: 9.9g

entry.title: Pad See Ew
entry.content:
A high-protein twist on a take-away classic! This Pad See Ew is packed with tender chicken, chewy noodles, and crisp Chinese broccoli, all tossed in a rich, umami-packed sauce. With a squeeze of fresh lime and a sprinkle of crushed peanuts, every bite is bursting with flavor. Plus, adding Super Beauty Greens gives this dish an extra glow-boosting kick!

Ingredients (Serves 4)

  • 400g chicken breast
  • 2 eggs, whisked
  • 250g pad thai noodles
  • 6-8 stems Chinese broccoli
  • ¼ cup Spring onions
  • 1 white onion
  • 3-4 cloves garlic
  • 1 tbsp soy sauce
  • 2 tsp dark soy sauce
  • 1 tbsp oyster sauce
  • 2 tbsp + 1 tsp avocado oil
  • 1 tbsp fresh lime juice
  • To serve: Fresh lime juice Crushed peanuts

Method

  1. Prepare the ingredients – Cook the pad thai noodles according to package instructions, drain, and set aside. While the noodles cook, roughly chop the Chinese broccoli into bite-sized pieces, slice the white onion thinly, chop the spring onions, and mince the garlic.
  2. Marinate the chicken – In a bowl, mix the chicken with 1 tsp dark soy sauce, 1 tsp avocado oil, and 1 tbsp fresh lime juice. Set aside.
  3. Prepare the sauce – In a small bowl, combine 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp dark soy sauce, and 1 tbsp oyster sauce. Set aside.
  4. Cook the chicken – Heat 1 tbsp avocado oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken in a single layer, cooking in batches if needed. Once golden and cooked through, remove from the pan.
  5. Sauté the vegetables – Add another 1 tbsp avocado oil to the same pan. Sauté the minced garlic for 30 seconds, stirring constantly, then add the sliced onion and cook until softened. Add the chopped Chinese broccoli and cook for 1 minute until slightly wilted.
  6. Cook the noodles – Add the cooked noodles to the pan and pour in the prepared sauce. Stir well to coat everything evenly. Let the noodles sear 2-3 times for about 40 seconds each without stirring so they absorb the flavors.
  7. Scramble the eggs – Move the noodles and veggies to one side of the pan. Pour the whisked eggs into the empty space and scramble until just set. Mix everything together.
  8. Finish the dish – Add the cooked chicken back to the pan, stir well, and cook for another minute. Remove from heat and squeeze over fresh lime juice.
  9. Serve – Garnish with spring onions, crushed peanuts, and additional lime juice if desired. Enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serving)

Calories: 490 kcal 
Protein: 30.2g
Carbohydrates: 56.5g
Fat: 15.0g
Fibre: 3.2g

entry.title: Chickpea Curry with Super Beauty Greens
entry.content:
Bold, flavourful, and packed with plant-based goodness—this Chickpea Curry is a hearty, nourishing dish that’s perfect for any meal! Infused with warming spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric, it’s a comforting bowl of goodness. Plus, with the addition of our Super Beauty Greens, it’s a glow-boosting meal that supports your skin from the inside out.

Ingredients (Serves 4)

  • 1 medium red chilli
  • 4 garlic cloves
  • 1 (2-inch) piece fresh ginger
  • 1 medium yellow onion
  • 6 tbsp oil (e.g., avocado or canola)
  • 2 tsp ground coriander
  • 2 tsp ground cumin
  • ½ tsp ground turmeric
  • 2 ¼ tins canned diced tomatoes
  • ¾ tsp salt
  • 2 400ml cans chickpeas, rinsed
  • 2 tsp garam masala
  • ¼ cup fresh coriander, for garnish
  • 1 serve of The Collagen Co. Super Beauty Greens

Method

  1. Blend Aromatics: In a food processor, pulse the chilli, garlic, and ginger until minced. Add the onion and pulse again until finely chopped.
  2. Sauté Base: Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Cook the onion mixture, stirring occasionally, until softened (about 3-5 minutes). Add coriander, cumin, and turmeric, stirring for another 2 minutes.
  3. Simmer Curry: Pulse the tomatoes in the food processor until finely chopped, then add them to the pan with salt. Lower the heat and let it simmer for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  4. Add Chickpeas: Stir in chickpeas and garam masala. Cover and let simmer on low for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  5. Serve: Garnish with fresh cilantro and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serving)

Calories: 443
Protein: 13g
Carbohydrates: 44g
Fat: 26g
Fiber: 12g

entry.title: Chicken Mango Salsa Lettuce Wraps
entry.content:
Fresh, light, and packed with protein—these Chicken Mango Salsa Lettuce Wraps are the perfect balance of sweet, savory, and zesty! Juicy chicken meets a vibrant mango salsa, all wrapped in crisp lettuce for a deliciously nourishing meal. Paired with a refreshing glass of Grape Collagen, it’s the ultimate glow-boosting combo!

Ingredients (serves 3)

  • 450g chicken breast or tenderloins
  • Salt and pepper, to taste
  • Olive oil spray, for cooking 
    Mango Salsa
  • 1 mango, diced
  • 1 Lebanese cucumber, diced
  • 1 red capsicum, diced
  • 1 avocado, diced
  • ½ small red onion, diced
  • Juice of ½ lime
  • Salt and pepper, to taste
    To Serve
  • Cos or butter lettuce leaves
  • 6 scoops Purple Grape Premium Collagen Peptides + 3 glasses water

Method

  1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
  2. Heat a skillet over medium heat, spray with olive oil, and cook for 4-5 minutes per side (or until fully cooked). Set aside, let rest, then dice into cubes.
  3. In a large bowl, combine all mango salsa ingredients and stir to mix well.
  4. Arrange lettuce leaves on a plate. Add 2-3 tablespoons of mango salsa to each, then top with diced chicken.
  5. Add 2 scoops of collagen to each glass of water and stir to dissolve.

entry.title: Banana Poppyseed Bread
entry.content:
Light, moist, and packed with protein—this Banana Poppyseed Bread is the perfect balance of sweet, zesty, and nourishing! Made with our Banana Glow Powder, almond meal, and a hint of lemon, it’s a deliciously wholesome twist on a classic. Pair it with the creamy banana butter spread for an extra boost of flavour and collagen goodness.

Ingredients (serves 8)

  • 3 medium (285g) ripe bananas, mashed
  • 1 large egg
  • 3 tbsp lemon juice
  • 1 tsp lemon zest
  • 4 scoops banana glow powder
  • 1 1/2 cups almond meal
  • 2 tbsp poppyseeds
  • 2 tsp baking powder
  • Optional Banana Butter Spread: 1 scoop banana glow powder 2-3 tbsp water

Method

  1. Preheat the oven to 150°C (fan-forced) and line a small loaf pan with baking paper.
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together the mashed banana, egg, lemon juice, and lemon zest.
  3. Add the banana glow powder, almond meal, poppyseeds, and baking powder. Stir to combine.
  4. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick comes out clean.
  5. For the banana butter spread, mix the banana glow powder with water in a small bowl until smooth and creamy, adding more water if needed. Serve the bread with the spread if desired, and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per slice, not including spread)

Calories: 217 
Fat: 12.8g
Carbs: 15.2g
Protein: 12.7g

entry.title: Healthy Choc Tart
entry.content:
Decadent, rich, and secretly good for you—this Healthy Choc Tart is a game-changer! Made with dark chocolate, naturally sweet pears, and a boost of Unflavoured Collagen, it’s the ultimate guilt-free indulgence. Smooth, creamy, and packed with antioxidants, it’s perfect for when you crave something sweet and nourishing.

Ingredients (serves 4)

  • 3 medium pears, peeled and cored
  • 250g dark chocolate
  • 4 scoops Unflavoured Premium Collagen Peptides

Method

  1. Cook the pears – Peel, core, and chop the pears. Boil in water for 10 minutes until soft, then drain.
  2. Melt the chocolate – In a heatproof bowl over a saucepan with simmering water, melt the dark chocolate on low heat.
  3. Blend – Add the cooked pears, melted chocolate, and collagen to a blender. Blend until smooth.
  4. Set – Pour the mixture into a small cake tin or dish and top with any leftover melted chocolate. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or until set.
  5. Serve – Dust with cacao powder if desired and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories: 232
Protein: 9g
Carbohydrates: 20g
Fat: 12g
Fibre: 5g

entry.title: High Protein Zucchini Fritters
entry.content:
Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside—these fritters are the perfect blend of light, fresh, and satisfying! Packed with cottage cheese, eggs, and a hint of lemon zest, they’re loaded with protein and flavour. Serve with a dollop of Greek yogurt and a squeeze of lemon for the ultimate nourishing meal.

Ingredients (2 servings)

  • 1 large zucchini
  • 3 eggs
  • 100g cottage cheese
  • 2 tbsp gluten-free flour
  • ½ tsp baking soda
  • 1 garlic clove
  • ½ onion
  • Fresh parsley
  • 1tsp Lemon zest
  • ¼ tsp salt
  • Olive oil, for cooking
  • Lemon juice and greek yoghurt, to serve

Method

  1. Prepare the zucchini: Grate the zucchini using a box grater or food processor. Place the grated zucchini into a clean kitchen towel or cheesecloth and squeeze out any excess moisture. Set aside.
  2. Finely chop the garlic clove, onion, and fresh parsley. Set aside.
  3. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix well.
  4. Cook the fritters: Heat a non-stick skillet or frying pan over medium heat and add a small drizzle of olive oil. Spoon a couple of tablespoons of the fritter mixture into the pan, flattening each one slightly with the back of the spoon. Cook the fritters for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden and cooked through.
  5. Serve: Transfer the cooked fritters to a plate. Serve with yoghurt and a squeeze of lemon juice.

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories: 289
Protein: 18g
Carbohydrates: 16g
Fat: 17g
Fiber: 3g

entry.title: Pink Pasta
entry.content:
Creamy, vibrant, and packed with glow-boosting goodness—this Pink Pasta is as nourishing as it is stunning! Roasted beets, ricotta, and Parmesan create a silky-smooth sauce, perfectly coating your favorite pasta for a dish that's rich in antioxidants and flavor. Topped with crunchy pistachios, fresh mint, and a drizzle of honey, it’s the perfect balance of savory and sweet.

Ingredients (serves 4)

  • 450g pasta of your choice
  • 2 medium beets (about 300g)
  • 2 tbsp (30ml) olive oil
  • 2 garlic cloves
  • 1 cup (240g) ricotta cheese (whole milk)
  • 1/4 cup (25g) grated Parmesan cheese
  • Zest and juice of 1 lemon
  • Salt & pepper to taste
  • 1/4 cup (60ml) reserved pasta water
  • Optional: Crushed pistachios, fresh mint and honey for topping

Method

  1. Roast the beets and garlic – Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Wash and peel the beets, cut into cubes and drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place on a baking sheet with the garlic cloves and roast for 35-40 minutes until beets are tender, and garlic is soft.
  2. Cook pasta – While the beets roast, cook the pasta in salted boiling water according to package directions. Drain and reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water.
  3. Prepare beet sauce – Blend the roasted beets and garlic with 1 cup (240g) of ricotta cheese, 1/4 cup (60ml) pasta water, lemon juice, parmesan cheese and a pinch of salt and pepper until smooth.
  4. Combine pasta and sauce – In a bowl, add pasta and beet sauce and stir to combine, adding more pasta water if needed to reach a creamy consistency.
  5. Finish the dish – Top with crushed pistachios, fresh mint, and a drizzle of honey. Season with more salt and pepper to taste.

Nutrition Information (per serving)

Calories: 425
Protein: 15g
Carbohydrates: 55g
Fat: 14g
Fibre: 6g

entry.title: Salmon Sushi Salad
entry.content:
Fresh, flavourful, and protein-packed—this Salmon Sushi Salad is your new go-to for a nourishing, satisfying meal! Crispy air-fried salmon, crunchy veggies, and creamy avocado come together with a spicy sriracha-yogurt dressing for the ultimate sushi-inspired bowl. Served with a refreshing glass of Strawberry Watermelon Collagen for a skin-loving boost.

Ingredients

  • 150g salmon, cut into cubes
  • Salt & pepper, to taste
  • 2 small Lebanese cucumbers, sliced
  • ½ cup shelled edamame
  • ¼ red onion, thinly sliced
  • ¼ avocado, cubed
  • ¼ cup plain protein yoghurt
  • 1–2 tsp sriracha
  • 2 tsp soy sauce
  • 1–2 tsp furikake seasoning
  • ½ tsp toasted sesame oil
  • 1 glass water + 1 scoop Strawberry Watermelon collagen

Method

  1. Season the salmon cubes with salt and pepper, then air-fry at 180°C for 6 minutes.
  2. Bring a small pot of water to a boil, add the edamame, and cook for 2 minutes. Drain well.
  3. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix well to coat everything in the sauces. Serve with extra furikake on top.
  4. Stir the collagen into the water until dissolved and serve on the side. Enjoy!

Macros

  • Calories: 561
  • Fat: 24.9g
  • Carbs: 44.1g
  • Protein: 47.7g

entry.title: Mixed Berry Ninja Creami Protein Ice Cream
entry.content:
Indulge in a creamy, protein-packed treat that’s as delicious as it is nutritious! Made with our Strawberry Glow Shake powder and bursting with juicy mixed berries, this easy Ninja Creami recipe is the perfect way to satisfy your sweet tooth while supporting radiant skin. Top it off with a drizzle of sugar-free chocolate and a sprinkle of granola for the ultimate guilt-free dessert.

Ingredients (serves 2)

  • 1 1/2 cups low-fat milk 
  • 2 scoops Strawberry Milkshake Glow Shake
  • 1/3 cup mixed frozen berries

Method

  1. Pour the milk and glow powder into the Creami pint and whisk until well combined
  2. Stir in the berries.
  3. Secure the lid and freeze overnight.
  4. Once frozen, process on the "Lite Ice Cream" setting.
  5. Scoop into bowls, drizzle with sugar-free chocolate syrup, and sprinkle with granola if desired. Enjoy!

Macros

Calories: 202
Fat: 7g
Carbs: 16.9g
Protein: 20.7g

entry.title: Love Gummies
entry.content:
These Love Gummies are a fun and easy treat, packed with the goodness of collagen and a burst of fruity flavour. Perfect for gifting, sharing, or just enjoying as a sweet, nutritious snack.

Ingredients (makes 24 gummies)

  • 1 cup boiling water
  • 2 tbsp gelatin
  • 2 scoops Strawberry Watermelon Premium Collagen Peptides
  • Edible glitter, for garnish

Method

  1. In a heatproof bowl, whisk together the boiling water, gelatin, and collagen until fully dissolved.
  2. Pour the mixture into mini heart-shaped silicone molds.
  3. Chill in the refrigerator until set, about 30 minutes.
  4. Remove the gummies from the molds and coat them in edible glitter. Enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per 2 gummies)

Calories 50

Protein 4g

Cabs 2g

Fats 0g

entry.title: Valentine's Day Cupid’s Mocktail
entry.content:
Celebrate love with this romantic and refreshing Valentine’s Day mocktail! A luscious blend of sweet strawberries, exotic lychees, and zesty lemon juice, infused with strawberry watermelon collagen for a radiant glow. Finished with a touch of lychee syrup for a perfectly balanced sweetness, this vibrant pink drink is as delightful as it is nourishing—cheers to love and wellness!

Ingredients (serves 1)

  • 2 scoops Strawberry Watermelon Premium Collagen Peptides

  • 150ml Lemon juice

  • 3 Strawberries

  • 3 Lychees

  • 150ml Lychee syrup

Top with:

  • Ice

  • Flower petals

  • Lychee

  • Strawberry

Method

  1. Wash and slice strawberries in half. Peel and remove seeds from the lychees or use canned.

  2. In a shaker or blender, combine the collagen powder, lemon juice, strawberries, lychees, and lychee syrup. Blend until smooth, or shake until combined.

  3. Strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve for a smoother texture if preferred.

  4. Fill the glass with ice, then pour the mocktail mixture evenly over the ice.

  5. Top with flower petals, a whole lychee, and a strawberry slice. Stir gently and enjoy chilled.

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories 228
Protein 14g
Carbs 19g
Fats 1g
Fibre 3g

entry.title: Italian Beach Sandwich
entry.content:
Layers of fresh Turkish bread with rich basil pesto, melted mozzarella, and savory ham or salami. Topped with fresh rocket, sweet roasted cherry tomatoes, and a drizzle of spicy hot honey, it’s the perfect balance of bold flavors. Served with a refreshing Super Beauty Greens Strawberry Kiwi drink for a vibrant, nutrient-packed boost!

Ingredients (serves 1)

  • 100g turkish bread

  • 1 tbsp basil pesto

  • 25g mozzarella cheese

  • 25g ham/salami

  • ½ cup rocket

  • ½ cup cherry tomatoes (roasted)

  • 2 tsp hot honey

  • Salt

  • 1 serve of Super Beauty Greens drink

Method

  1. Slice the Turkish bread in half horizontally and spread the basil pesto on the bottom side of the bread.

  2. Layer with cheese, rocket, roasted cherry tomatoes, salt, pepper, ham and drizzle with honey. 

  3. Place the other half of the bread on top.

  4. Mix one serve of the Super Beauty Greens Strawberry Kiwi powder with water as per the package instructions. Stir well and serve chilled alongside your meal.

Nutrition Information (per serve + greens powder)

Calories 633
Protein 39g
Carbs 70g
Fats 22g
Fibre 7g

entry.title: Air Fryer Fish Tacos
entry.content:
Crispy, flavorful, and oh-so-delicious, these Air Fryer Fish Tacos are a must-try! Made with perfectly seasoned white fish coated in panko breadcrumbs and paired with crunchy red cabbage, juicy tomato, and zesty Perinaise, they’re a fresh and satisfying meal. Serve it up with our Super Beauty Greens—a refreshing and nutrient-packed drink that complements this meal beautifully!

Ingredients

  • 350g white fish

  • 1 cup panko breadcrumbs

  • 1/2 tsp paprika

  • 1/2 tsp ground coriander

  • 1/2 tsp garlic powder

  • 1 tsp salt

  • 1/4 tsp pepper

  • 12 tortillas (Coles brand)

  • Perinaise Peri-Peri Mayonnaise

  • 3 cups shredded red cabbage

  • 1 large tomato, diced

  • 1 cup corn kernels

  • 1/4 red onion, diced

  • Super Beauty greens, to serve

Method

  1. Cut the fish into bite-sized pieces (about 24 pieces).

  2. In a medium shallow bowl, combine the panko breadcrumbs with the paprika, coriander, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Mix well.

  3. Dip each piece of fish into the breadcrumb mixture, ensuring it’s well coated. Place the coated pieces into the air fryer basket in a single layer.

  4. Lightly spray the fish with olive oil spray, then air fry at 170°C for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

  5. For each taco, add 2 pieces of fish, a drizzle of Perinaise, 1/4 cup of cabbage, 1 tablespoon of tomato, 1 tablespoon of corn, and 1 teaspoon of onion.

  6. Mix 2 scoops of beauty greens with 1 glass of water per person and serve alongside the tacos.

Macros Per Serving (2 Tacos + 1 Beauty Drink):

Calories: 371
Fat: 11.6g
Carbs: 46.8g
Protein: 19.9g

entry.title: Salted Caramel Thick Shake
entry.content:
Indulge in the ultimate sweet treat with our Salted Caramel Thick Shake! Made with the creamy goodness of our Cinnamon Churro Glow Shake, this deliciously decadent recipe combines rich caramel flavours with collagen and protein. A guilt-free delight that satisfies your cravings while supporting your glow goals!

Ingredients (serves 1)

Shake

  • 1/2 cup ice cubes

  • 2 scoops Salted Caramel Milkshake Glow Shake

  • 300ml water

  • 1 tbsp Sugar-Free Caramel Syrup

Topping

  • Light whipped cream

  • Salted caramel popcorn (for sprinkling)

Method

  1. In a blender, add ice cubes, Salted Caramel Glow Shakes and water. Blend on high speed until smooth and thick.

  2. Line the edges of the glass with sugar free caramel syrup. Pour the thick shake into a glass.

  3. Top with whipped cream, caramel syrup and popcorn. Enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serve without toppings)
Calories: 210
Protein: 29g
Carbs: 7g
Fats: 7g
Fibre: 5g

entry.title: Air Fryer Cinnamon Churros
entry.content:
Satisfy your sweet tooth with our healthy Air Fryer Cinnamon Churros! Lightly crisp on the outside, soft on the inside, and packed with collagen for added beauty benefits. The ultimate guilt-free comfort snack—made healthier and ready in minutes!

Ingredients (makes 5)

  • 1/2 cup self-raising flour

  • 2 scoops cinnamon churro glow

  • 1/2 cup plain protein yogurt

  • Olive oil spray

To Coat

  • 1 scoop cinnamon churro glow

  • 1/2 tsp cinnamon

Method

  1. Add all ingredients to a large mixing bowl and stir to form a dough.

  2. Divide the dough into 5 pieces and roll each piece by hand to form a log.

  3. Place on a baking sheet greased with oil.

  4. Place in the air fryer and cook at 160°C for 15-18 minutes.

  5. In a shallow bowl, mix the glow powder with the cinnamon.

  6. Transfer the churros to a cooling rack, lightly spray with oil, and then toss in the cinnamon mixture to coat.

  7. Serve with melted chocolate and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per Churro)

Calories: 118
Fat: 2.1g
Carbs: 13.5g
Protein: 12.7g

entry.title: Frothy Violet Crumble Hot Chocolate
entry.content:
Cozy up with our indulgent Frothy Hot Chocolate, made with the decadent Violet Crumble Collagen Dream formula. This rich and creamy treat is packed with beauty-boosting collagen and relaxation benefits, topped with fluffy mini marshmallows for the ultimate comfort in every sip. Sweet dreams just got tastier!

Ingredients (Serves 1)

  • 2 tsp Violet Crumble Collagen Dream Sleep Formula
  • 200ml Almond Milk, Unsweetened
  • 10 mini Marshmallows

Method

  1. Heat almond milk over the stove top until warm. 
  2. Transfer almond milk to a glass or mug and add hot chocolate powder. Using a hand mixer, mix until milk is frothed. Top with mini marshmallows.
  3. Enjoy warm!

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories 97
Protein 7g
Carbs 11g
Fats 3g
Fibre 2g

https://www.instagram.com/reel/Cw18JN1Jjis/

entry.title: Piña Colada Glow Smoothie
entry.content:
Say hello to your ultimate wellness treat—our Pina Colada Glow Smoothie! This tropical blend of pineapple and creamy coconut features our Super Beauty Greens, offering a burst of collagen and beauty-boosting benefits. Packed with skin-loving nutrients, gut support, and a refreshing tropical flavour, it’s the perfect way to sip your way to radiant health.

Ingredients (makes 9)

  • 1 cup frozen pineapple cubes
  • 2 scoops Tropical Punch Super Beauty Greens
  • 1/3 cup plain yogurt
  • 1/4 cup coconut cream
  • 1/2 cup ice cubes
  • 1 tsp almond butter
  • Optional: 1/4 cup water (to adjust consistency)

Method

  1. Combine all ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend until smooth.
  2. Garnish a glass with a pineapple wedge, pour in the smoothie, and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories 257
Protein 13.2g
Carbs 28.4g
Fats 11g

entry.title: Cinnamon Churro Doughnuts
entry.content:
Packed with protein and collagen, these fluffy doughnuts deliver the warm, spiced flavours of cinnamon churro while supporting your skin, hair, and joints. A delicious way to satisfy your sweet tooth and nourish your body at the same time.

Ingredients (makes 9)

  • 2 scoops Cinnamon Churro Glow Shake
  • 1 cup self-raising flour
  • 1/4 cup plain protein yoghurt
  • 1/2 cup milk of choice

To Coat

  • 1 scoop Cinnamon Churro Glow Shake
  • 1/2 tsp cinnamon

Method

  1. Preheat oven to 160°C and grease a doughnut mold with oil.
  2. Add all ingredients to a large mixing bowl and stir to form a thick batter.
  3. Divide the batter into the doughnut molds and gently tap to flatten.
  4. Bake for 25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.
  5. In a shallow bowl, mix the glow shake powder with the cinnamon.
  6. Transfer the doughnuts to a cooling rack, lightly spray with oil, and then toss in the cinnamon mixture to coat.

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories 68
Protein 6.7g
Carbs 7.9g
Fats 1.4g

entry.title: Choc Mint Ninja Creami Protein Ice Cream
entry.content:
Made with our Merry Choc Mint Glow Shake, this creamy and refreshing treat is packed with hunger-curbing protein, anti-ageing collagen, and the indulgent blend of rich chocolate and cool mint. It's a guilt-free dessert that satisfies your sweet tooth while supporting your glow goals. Perfect for a post-workout snack or a holiday indulgence—without the compromise!

Ingredients (serves 2)

  • 1 1/2 cups low fat milk
  • 2 scoops Merry Choc Mint Glow Shake 
  • 1 teaspoon sprinkles

Method

  1. Pour the milk and glow powder into the Creami pint and whisk until well combined.
  2. Secure the lid and freeze overnight.
  3. Once frozen, mix on the "Lite Cream" setting.
  4. Scoop into bowls, top with sprinkles if desired, and enjoy!

Nutrition Information (per serve)

Calories 182.5
Protein 18.5g
Carbs 3.25g
Fats 3.25g

entry.title: Pumpkin Granola Bars
entry.content:
These Pumpkin Granola Bars are the perfect blend of festive flavours and functional nutrition. Made with real pumpkin puree, warm spices, and crunchy oats, they're boosted with collagen for healthy joints, bones, and glowing skin. A delicious, grab-and-go snack that’s packed with fiber, protein, and the benefits of collagen—perfect for fueling your day!

Ingredients (makes 8)

  • 2 cups rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1/3 cup honey
  • 1 tsp pumpkin pie spice
  • 2 scoops unflavored collagen
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 3 tbsp chia seeds
  • 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds
  • 1 cup milk of choice
  • 1/2 cup chocolate chips

Method

  1. Preheat the oven to 160°C (320°F) and line a square baking dish with parchment paper.
  2. In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients except the chocolate chips. Stir well to combine.
  3. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish, then sprinkle the chocolate chips on top.
  4. Bake for 35-45 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
  5. Allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing.

Nutrition Information (per serve)
Calories 244
Protein 9g 
Carbs 34.7g 
Fats 8.8g 
Fibre 1g

entry.title: Collagen Mini Pavlova
entry.summary:
The perfect recipe for your next party, this bite size dessert will leave your guests wanting more! Topped off with our Strawberry Watermelon Collagen in a mouth-watering flavoured cream topping.

More
entry.content:
The perfect recipe for your next party, this bite size dessert will leave your guests wanting more! Topped off with our Strawberry Watermelon Collagen in a mouth-watering flavoured cream topping.

Low Carb │ Gluten Free │ Refined Sugar Free 

INGREDIENTS

6 Egg Whites (room temp) 

1 1/2 Cups Granulated Monkfruit Sweetener

2 tsp Cornstarch 

1/2 Tbsp Fresh Lemon Juice 

1/2 Tbsp Pure Vanilla Extract 

 

Strawberry Watermelon Cream

2  Cups Thickened Cream 

2/3 Cups Powdered Monkfruit Sweetener 

2-3 Scoops The Collagen Co Stawberry Watermelon Collagen 

 

To Serve

Fresh Raspberries

Drizzled Passionfruit 

  

METHOD

  1. Preheat the Oven to 110⁰C. Line a large tray with parchment paper. Using a stand or hand mixer, beat the egg whites until soft peaks form. With the mixer on, gradually add the sweetener and beat until smooth and glossy.
  2. Using a spatula, quickly fold in the lemon juice and vanilla extract. Follow with folding in the corn starch. Mix until well blended.
  3. Pipe meringue into small nests onto the parchment paper. Indent the centre with a spoon to allow room for cream. Bake for 1 hour and 15 min then turn the oven off and without opening the door, let meringue sit in the hot oven another 30 min. Allow to cool on a wire rack. 
  4. Meanwhile, beat the thickened cream using a stand or hand mixer, slowly adding in the sweetener. Sprinkle in the collagen. Continue to beat until thick and spreadable. Pipe frosting onto the pavlova and top with fresh fruit.

entry.title: Salted Caramel Lava Cake
entry.content:
Indulge in the ultimate treat with our Salted Caramel Lava Cake! This decadent dessert oozes with caramel while sneaking in a healthy twist—packed with protein and collagen to support your glow and recovery. It’s the perfect guilt-free way to satisfy your sweet tooth and fuel your body!

Ingredients (Serves 1):

Lava Cake
  • 2 scoops Salted Caramel Glow Shake
  • 1 egg
  • ½ tsp baking powder
  • 1 tbsp almond milk
  • 1 tbsp Sugar Free Maple Syrup

Toppings

  • 10g dark chocolate
  • 2 tsp Sugar Free Caramel Syrup

Method:

  1. In a small bowl mix protein powder, egg, baking powder, almond milk and maple syrup. 
  2. Add ingredients to a ramekin and top with chocolate. Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes at 180oC. 
  3. Remove from oven and top with caramel syrup.

Macros (per bar):

  • Calories: 344
  • Protein: 36g
  • Carbs: 15g
  • Fats: 16g
  • Fibre: 6g

entry.title: Choc Mint Thick Shake
entry.content:
Get ready to sleigh your cravings with our Choc Mint Thick Shake! This creamy, dreamy blend of rich chocolate, refreshing mint, and collagen is the ultimate holiday indulgence—with a healthy twist. Treat yourself to a festive favourite that’s as good for you as it is delicious!

Ingredients (Serves 1):

  • 1 cup ice cubes
  • 2 scoops merry choc-mint glow shakes powder
  • 300ml water
  • 1 tbsp sugar-free chocolate syrup
  • Whipped cream to top

Method:

  1. Add the ice cubes, glow powder, and water to a high-speed blender and blend for 30 seconds.
  2. Drizzle chocolate syrup around the rim of a large glass.
  3. Pour the thickshake into the glass and top with whipped cream. Dust with extra glow powder if desired and enjoy!

Macros (per bar):

  • Calories: 256
  • Protein: 29.9g
  • Carbs: 14.3g
  • Fats: 11.2g

entry.title: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Paper Rolls
entry.content:
Light, fresh, and packed with flavour! These healthy Teriyaki Chicken Rice Paper Rolls combine tender chicken, crisp veggies, and a tangy teriyaki kick for a guilt-free, delicious meal or snack. Perfect for when you crave something tasty yet nutritious!

Ingredients (makes 6):

  • 1 large chicken breast, thinly sliced
  • 3 tbsp teriyaki sauce
  • 6 rice paper sheets
  • Toasted sesame seeds
  • 1/2 avocado, thinly sliced
  • 2 zucchinis, shredded into strips
  • 2 medium carrots, shredded
  • Extra teriyaki sauce, for serving
  • Per serving: 1 scoop Purple Grape Collagen Powder + water

Method:

  1. Slice the chicken breast with scissors into thin pieces, then place in a bowl. Pour over the teriyaki sauce and toss to coat.
  2. Heat a small pan over medium heat and spray with oil. Add the chicken, cooking each side for about 2 minutes.
  3. Soak one rice paper sheet in cold water, then lay it on a damp chopping board for about 20 seconds, until it’s pliable but not overly soft.
  4. Sprinkle toasted sesame seeds in the center, then layer with 2-3 slices of avocado, zucchini, carrot, and 2 pieces of teriyaki chicken, leaving about an inch around the edges.
  5. Fold the bottom edge over the filling, then fold in the sides like a burrito, and roll it up. Repeat for each roll.
  6. Dissolve 1 scoop of grape collagen per person in a large glass of water and stir.
  7. Serve the rice paper rolls with the collagen drink and extra teriyaki sauce. Enjoy!

Macros (2 rolls + 1 collagen drink):

  • Calories: 299
  • Protein: 41g
  • Carbs: 22.7g
  • Fats: 6.7g

entry.title: High Protein S'mores Bars
entry.content:
Indulge in a guilt-free twist on a classic treat with these healthy collagen S’mores Bars! Packed glow-boosting collagen, they’re a deliciously wholesome way to enjoy ooey-gooey marshmallows, rich chocolate, and crunchy graham crackers—without the sugar overload.

Ingredients (makes 12 bars):

  • 2 cups rolled oats
  • 2 scoops vanilla glow shake
  • 1 tsp baking powder
  • 1/4 cup maple syrup or honey
  • 1.5 cups milk of choice
  • 1/2 cup chopped dark chocolate
  • 1/2 cup mini marshmallows
  • 1/2 cup chopped graham crackers or milk arrowroot biscuits

Method:

  1. Preheat the oven to 160°C (320°F) and line a square baking pan with parchment paper.
  2. In a large bowl, combine the oats, vanilla glow powder, baking powder, maple syrup, and milk.
  3. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan, then sprinkle the chopped chocolate, marshmallows, and biscuits on top.
  4. Gently press the toppings into the oat mixture with the back of a spoon to ensure everything sticks together.
  5. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the bars are cooked through.
  6. Let them cool slightly, then slice and enjoy!

Macros (per bar):

  • Calories: 123
  • Protein: 5g
  • Carbs: 19g
  • Fats: 4.4g

entry.title: Mini Pumpkin Pie
entry.content:
Indulge in these Mini Pumpkin Pies with a collagen boost! Creamy, spiced pumpkin filling meets a biscuity crust, delivering a treat that’s as nourishing as it is delicious.


Ingredients (makes 1):

  • 2 tbsp (40g) vanilla protein yogurt
  • 2 tbsp pumpkin puree
  • 1 large egg
  • 2 tsp maple syrup
  • 1/2 tsp pumpkin pie spice
  • 1 scoop Vanilla Milkshake Collagen Meal Replacement
  • 2 tsp tapioca flour or cornstarch
  • 2 plain or milk coffee biscuits
  • 1/2 tsp coconut oil
  • Whipped cream to serve

Method:

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (160°C) and line a small circular ramekin with parchment paper.
  2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the yogurt, pumpkin puree, egg, maple syrup, pumpkin pie spice, tapioca flour, and collagen until smooth to form the custard filling.
  3. In a small bowl, crush the biscuits and mix with the coconut oil and 1 tsp of cold water to form a crumbly dough. Press this mixture into the bottom of the ramekin to create the base.
  4. Pour the custard filling over the biscuit base. Bake for 30 minutes, or until the cheesecake is firm to the touch. If the top browns too quickly, cover with foil while baking.
  5. Let it cool for 20 minutes, then serve with whipped cream and enjoy!

Macros:

  • Calories: 293
  • Protein: 17.1g
  • Carbs: 21.7g
  • Fats: 8.1g
